channel.title: 525 [Summoning help]

item.title: 525 [Summoning help]
item.dc:creator: @oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo
item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

i have my summoning things correct, but for some reason i have no idea how to make a command that dismiss’s the pet

here is my code
if (p.summonedFamiliar = true);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You summon a Spirit wolf.”);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Spawn More than ONE = BAN.”);
Server.engine.newNPC(6829, p.absX-1, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, false, p.playerId);

My summoning is on the quest tab.
what am i suppose to put when i want to summon the animal? for example. if (p.summonedFamiliar = true);
so if i want the command to be ::leave should i just make the oppisite?, what should be under the command ::leave
MIne is-

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“leave”)) {
p.summonedFamiliar = false;
}

Read full topic
